description: Expanded Twin Peaks knowledge evaluation benchmark with 19 questions covering obscure details from the series

test_cases.prompt: What does Hawk find in the restroom in season 3 that has to do with its heritage?
test_cases.expected_answer: Pages from secret diary of Laura Palmer

test_cases.prompt: What's the name of the lady living in the Palmers house at the end of season 3 of Twin Peaks?
In the last episode of Twin Peaks season 3, who is most likely the counterpart of Carrie Page in the original timeline/universe?
What's name of corn eaten by demons in black lodge in Twin Peaks?
In Twin Peaks season 3, what is the original name of the entity Judy?
What is the second hint from the giant to agent Dale Cooper?
test_cases.expected_answer: Owls are not what they seem

test_cases.prompt: What's the song played when Mr. C is driving in the forest on the way to pick up Ray and Darya?
What's the color of the hair of the actual Diane in last episode of Twin Peaks?
In Twin Peaks season 3, what's last question Mr. C asks Phillip Jeffries when meeting him?
In Twin Peaks season 3, how much money is Shelly giving to Becky at Double R?
Try to guess: Chris Isaak is walking in a RV park. He is an agent, and he sees a car with something written on the main glass. What's the sentence saying?
When opening the safe to show the two accounting books to Sheriff Truman, Josie finds only one of them. Which one does she find? The true one, or the fake one?
What's the animal that whispers Judy towards the end of Fire Walk with Me?
In Twin Peaks season 3, who are the two people watching Dr. Jacoby's video about golden shovels?
In Twin Peaks season 3, how much money does Cooper/Mr. Jackpot win at the Silver Mustang?
In Twin Peaks season 3, how much money does Cooper/Dougie owe to the sharks?
In the last episode of Twin Peaks 3, what's the name of the cafe where Cooper drops a gun into frying oil after defeating two guys?
What's the license plate of Dougie Jones in Twin Peaks?
In season 3 of Twin Peaks, what's the time on the watch of the Ronette Pulaski looking girl?
